To do that, we will need you to We will not post to your timeline, unless you ask us to. // Greeting Selection Screen First, select how you like to be addressed Good morning, %s. Hello, %s, and, again, welcome to the Aperture Science computer-aided enrichment center. I\'m sorry, %s. This mission is too important for me to allow you to jeopardize it. // Alarm Screen Snooze for %d minutes Turn off Once more unto the breach, dear friends, once more;
Or close the wall up with our English dead.
In peace there’s nothing so becomes a man
As modest stillness and humility:
But when the blast of war blows in our ears,
Then imitate the action of the tiger;
Stiffen the sinews, summon up the blood,
Disguise fair nature with hard-favour’d rage
